com.guimonsters.client

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guimonsters.client.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Actor

    public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Master class for every game object. This class defines the global fields for every game object: Actors, Players, NPCS, Monsters, Items, etc.
    Version:
    1.00, 2013-04-18
    Author:
    Elijah Atkinson, Stephen Butler

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameObject

        public GameObject(java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String description,
          java.lang.String location,
          int visibilityLevel)
        Create a new instance of a GameObject.
        Parameters:
        name - The name string associated with the GameObject.
        description - The long description of the GameObject (used by 'look' command).
        location - The GameObject's location in the game world. (Possibly the room object in which the GameObject resides)
        visibilityLevel - Degrees of visibility of the GameObject. 0 = Completely hidden from all interaction. 1 = Very well hidden 2 = Well hidden 3 = Hidden 4 = Slightly hidden 5 = Completely visible 6 = Glaringly visible

      • GameObject

        public GameObject(java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String description,
          java.lang.String location)
        Overloaded for GameObjects that are visible by default.
        Parameters:
        name - The name string associated with the GameObject.
        description - The long description of the GameObject (used by 'look' command).
        location - The GameObject's location in the game world.
